text:
is an old province of Japan in the area of Akita Prefecture on the island of Honshū. and some parts of Yamagata Prefecture. Along with Uzen Province, it was sometimes called. The history of the province started in 1868 and ended in 1872.
History.
During the Edo period and early Meiji period, the Satake clan were daimyo in the area.
In the Meiji period, the provinces of Japan were converted into prefectures. Maps of Japan and Ugo Province were reformed in the 1870s.
